name: Verify API should return error message when XSS injection is passed in env_id -- @1.1

steps.name: Given FireBase_User sends GET request to fetch environment details with an invalid env_id "<script>alert('XSS')</script>"
Then FireBase_API should contain the message Current request is not defined by this API

fullName: Fetch Environment Details API: Verify API should return error message when XSS injection is passed in env_id
